name: sharry
description: Sharry is a self-hosted file sharing application that lets users upload files and share links with expiration and optional passwords. It supports user accounts, quotas, and a polished web interface.
features: File uploads: Share files of any size with automatic chunking for large transfers.
Expiring links: Set time-based expiration for shared files to auto-delete after period.
Password protection: Secure shared files with optional passwords for recipient access.
User accounts: Create accounts with individual quotas and sharing permissions.
Anonymous sharing: Allow guest uploads without requiring account creation.
Download limits: Restrict number of downloads per shared link.
Email notifications: Send share links directly to recipients via email.
Alias management: Create memorable aliases for share links instead of random strings.
Upload tracking: Monitor who downloaded files and when for accountability.
Storage quotas: Enforce per-user storage limits to manage disk usage.
REST API: Automate file sharing and management via comprehensive API.
Mobile friendly: Upload and download files from mobile devices with responsive design.
